source.Select: SELECT TREE_NODE DEPTID,DESCR,'' DESCR_A,MANAGER_ID,TREE_LEVEL_NUM,Z_DEPTID_PARENT UPORG_CODE_A,COMPANY,Z_PLANT_ID PLANT_ID_A,LOCATION,'' SAL_LOCATION_A,0 FLAG,'AddCoHead2Org' MUSER,to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') MDATE FROM PS_Z_OG_WZSERS_VW
source.Update: UPDATE EMP_ORG_CROSS_PS SET DESCR=:DESCR,DESCR_A=:DESCR_A,MANAGER_ID=:MANAGER_ID,TREE_LEVEL_NUM=:TREE_LEVEL_NUM::INTEGER,UPORG_CODE_A=:UPORG_CODE_A, COMPANY=:COMPANY,PLANT_ID_A=:PLANT_ID_A,LOCATION=:LOCATION,SAL_LOCATION_A=:SAL_LOCATION_A,FLAG=:FLAG::INTEGER,MUSER=:MUSER,MDATE=to_date(:MDATE,'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') WHERE DEPTID=:DEPTID
source.Check: SELECT DEPTID FROM EMP_ORG_CROSS_PS WHERE DEPTID=:DEPTID
